summary: Added 10 pts damage of Mora's Agony and increased the charges to match Dawnbreaker.
descriptionHtml:
Miraak's sword now does what it should have done in the vanilla game in my oppinion!

I've added Mora's Agony enchantment to the sword so it does 10 pts of poison damage now. Has same effect as Miraak's staff except the sword applies it on hit and is weaker then the staff enchantment. I didn't want to make it overpowered since Miraak's sword already is awesome. I just wanted the visual effect of the tenacles.

It still has absorb 15 pts stamina which is the only showing description in-game. So the sword does absorbs 15 pts stamina + 10 pts poison damage on each hit.

I also increased charges to 5000 (Same as Dawnbreaker) and changed Value to match Daedric sword.

Additionally i made all 3 versions of the sword the same, so no matter when you get it it will have the same damage, enchantment and charges.
author: PerfectByNature
